activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: T'ur'n the metal piece on the lathe machine.
The c'ur've of the gear is smooth.
This  w'or'ker starts  work early every day.

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular , Nationalities

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the capital cities to the nationalities.
රාජධානී නගර ජාතිකත්වයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
மாநகரங்களையும் தேசியத்துவங்களையும் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: He eats Sri Lankan food, he watches Sri Lankan movies, and he listens to Sri Lankan news.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: She eats Chinese food, she watches Chinese movies, and she listens to Chinese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Japanese food, she watches Japanese movies, and she listens to Japanese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Russian food, he watches Russian movies, and he listens to Russian news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Omani food, he watches Omani movies, and he listens to Omani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Pakistani  food,  she watches Pakistani movies, and she listens to Pakistani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats German food, he watches German movies, and he listens to German news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats French food, she watches French movies, and she listens to French news.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He operates a lathe machine to shape metal parts.
He decorates a lathe machine to shape metal parts.
He ignores a lathe machine to shape metal parts.
examples.answer: He operates a lathe machine to shape metal parts.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He calibrates torque wrenches to maintain tightening of bolts.
He damages torque wrenches to maintain tightening of bolts.
He hides torque wrenches to maintain tightening of bolts.
content.answer: He calibrates torque wrenches to maintain tightening of bolts.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He supervises the assembly of gearboxes and drive shafts.
He forgets the assembly of gearboxes and drive shafts.
He polishes the assembly of gearboxes and drive shafts.
content.answer: He supervises the assembly of gearboxes and drive shafts.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He inspects hydraulic systems for leaks and pressure irregularities.
He paints hydraulic systems for leaks and pressure irregularities.
He ignores hydraulic systems for leaks and pressure irregularities.
content.answer: He inspects hydraulic systems for leaks and pressure irregularities.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He repairs bearings and replaces worn-out mechanical seals.
He burns bearings and replaces worn-out mechanical seals.
He hides bearings and ignores worn-out mechanical seals.
content.answer: He repairs bearings and replaces worn-out mechanical seals.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a foreman of an industrial factory complex?
options: He maintains CNC machines by aligning components.
He destroys CNC machines by aligning components.
He decorates CNC machines by aligning components.
content.answer: He maintains CNC machines by aligning components.

activity_b.text: He maintains CNC machines by aligning components.
He repairs bearings and replaces worn-out mechanical seals.
He inspects hydraulic systems for leaks and pressure irregularities.
He supervises the assembly of gearboxes and drive shafts.
He calibrates torque wrenches to maintain tightening of bolts.
He operates a lathe machine to shape metal parts.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_b.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What does Meena prepare before work?
options: She prepares the scaffolding.
She prepares the cement mixer.
She prepares the lathe machine.

Questions.question: What does she never forget?
options: To lubricate moving parts.
To lubricate the moving parts.
To paint the moving parts.

Questions.question: What tools does she use to measure accuracy?
Questions.answer: She uses a vernier caliper and micrometer.
options: She uses a hammer and chisel.
She uses a vernier caliper and micrometer.
She uses a screwdriver and tester.

Questions.question: What does she frequently clean?
options: The service log.
The oil tank.
The surface of the machine.

Questions.question: What does she always do before leaving?
Questions.answer: She switches off the machine, wipes the tools, and stores them.
options: She switches off the machine and stores the tools.
She switches off the machine, wipes the tools, and stores them.
She ignores the machine.

activity_b.text: Meena is a mechanical trainee in the workshop.
She works in the machine section every day.
She usually begins at half past eight.
She checks the work order, sets up her toolbox, and prepares the lathe machine.
She always follows the instructor’s safety rules carefully.
Meena inspects the machine parts, the chuck, and the cutting tool.
She often adjusts the feed rate and checks the alignment of the workpiece.
She sometimes replaces a worn-out bearing or a broken seal.
She never forgets to lubricate the moving parts with oil.
During routine practice, Meena measures the dimensions with a vernier caliper and checks the accuracy with a micrometer.
She records the values and shows them to her supervisor.
She frequently cleans the surface of the machine with a brush to remove metal chips.
At the end of the day, Meena switches off the machine, wipes down the tools, and stores them properly.
She always leaves the section neat and safe.
Meena enjoys her training because she improves her technical skills and gains confidence.

activity_c.text: Meena works in the machine section every day.
She checks the work order, sets up her toolbox, and prepares the lathe machine.
Meena inspects the machine parts, the chuck, and the cutting tool.
She often adjusts the feed rate and checks the alignment of the workpiece.
She sometimes replaces a worn-out bearing or a broken seal.
She never forgets to lubricate the moving parts with oil.
During routine practice, Meena measures the dimensions with a vernier caliper and checks the accuracy with a micrometer.
She records the values and shows them to her supervisor.
She frequently cleans the surface of the machine with a brush to remove metal chips.
At the end of the day, Meena switches off the machine, wipes down the tools, and stores them properly.
She always leaves the section neat and safe.
Meena enjoys her training because she improves her technical skills and gains confidence.
